Text.Page:
.

If you received this letter, you've arrived in Velika and are about to enter Headquarters.

There's a few things you need to know first. I've shared your cover story about being a recruit on the Island of Dawn, but some people are still suspicious.

We're doing our best to track down the traitor, but it's going to take some time. Until then, your real story is classified.

I'll do my best to protect you from federation politics, but I recommend you get out of the city and back into the field as soon as possible.

â€”DougalClose the letter.
